column1: '''''Risk: The Lord of the Rings Trilogy Edition''''' is a modification of ''[[wikipedia:Risk (game)
column2: Risk]]'', published in [[2003]] by Hasbro. It serves as merchandise to [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
column3: ''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]] and follows the earlier ''[[Risk: The Lord of the Rings: The Middle-earth Conquest Game]]''.

column1: The detailed gameboard reflects a complete map of [[Middle-earth]] including the [[Gondor]], [[Mordor]], and [[Haradwaith]] territories, areas that had not appeared in ''The Middle-earth Conquest Game''.
In this expanded edition of RISK The Lord of the Rings Trilogy edition you will find:
*The detailed gameboard reflects a complete map of Middle-Earth including the Gondor, Mordor, and Haradwaith territories.
*Includes materials from the entire Lord of the Rings film trilogy.
*Alternate ways to play including special rules for alliance team play.
*''[[Risk: The Lord of the Rings: The Middle-earth Conquest Game]]''
*''[[Risk: The Lord of the Rings: Gondor and Mordor]]''
* [http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/8107/risk-the-lord-of-the-rings-trilogy-edition Risk: The Lord of the Rings Trilogy Edition] at [http://boardgamegeek.com/ BoardGameGeek]
